title: British Opposition Parties Already Rejecting Latest Brexit Deal
text:
European Union leaders are hoping the British Parliament will vote in favor of the latest Brexit deal when it comes before the lawmakers Saturday, but opposition parties are already saying they won't.

Prime Minister Boris Johnson and the EU reached agreement early Thursday, two weeks before Johnson vowed to pull out of the EU, deal or no deal. Johnson called the latest deal "great" for Britain, its people, and the EU. "There is a very good case for MPs across the House of Commons to express the democratic will of the people as we have pledged many times to do and get Brexit done."
description: British Opposition Parties Already Rejecting Latest Brexit Deal
